import React from 'react' import './Products.css' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import {data} from '../productData' export default function Products() { return( <>
{ data.map((data,i) => (

{data.name}

{data.description}

Rs.{data.finalPrice} {data.strickPrice}{data.discount}% OFF
)) }
) }
